item.title: Fox News Politics Newsletter: Obama shows support in VA governor race
item.description: Welcome to the Fox News Politics newsletter, with the latest updates on the Trump administration, Capitol Hill and more Fox News politics content.

item.title: Obama-appointed judge says she wants body cameras for federal agents amid Chicago anti-ICE clashes
item.description: A federal judge has ordered ICE agents in the Chicago area to wear body cameras, citing concerns that they are not following one of her previous order...
